articles.title: European elections: Slovaks and others go to the polls - The Associated Press
articles.description: Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni joined voters in Italy and a half dozen European Union nations in casting a ballot during the penultimate day of European Union parliamentary elections on Saturday. The bloc’s premier hard right politician threw down the gauntlet…
articles.content: ROME (AP) Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni joined voters in Italy and a half dozen European Union nations in casting a ballot during the penultimate day of European Union parliamentary elections on Satu… [+5664 chars]

articles.author: GK NEWS SERVICE
articles.title: PM Modi expresses concern over attack on Denmarks PM Mette Frederiksen - Greater Kashmir
articles.description: This attack on a European leader follows closely after Slovak PM Robert Fico was shot multiple times last month while greeting supporters. Fico survived and has since undergone surgery
articles.content: New Delhi, June 08: Prime Minister Narendra Modi expressed his deep concern on X (formerly Twitter) following the attack on Denmarks Prime Minister, Mette Frederiksen. In his message, he stated, Deep… [+1816 chars]
